issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Undefined is not an object (evaluating 'copy.colors')","line":48,"column":79 in alloy.js

comments.body:
Hello,
please read the guide on how to report issues: 

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/3.0/#!/guide/How_to_Submit_a_Bug_Report

and provide at least:

- Description of the issue
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Expected results
- Actual results

Best Regards
